title: Bexorg awarded MJFF grant to identify biomarkers for TRPML1 Parkinson’s therapies
summary: Bexorg Inc., a neurotech company developing translational tools to accelerate central nervous system drug discovery, has been awarded a research grant by The Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson’s Research (MJFF) through the Targets to Therapies Initiative to help identify translational biomarkers for TRPML1-targeted Parkinson’s disease therapies, the company said. Translational biomarkers are biological signatures […] The post Bexorg awarded MJFF grant to identify biomarkers for TRPML1 Parkinson’s therapies appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
